topics.title: Multiuser ZeroNet sites
topics.body: What sites do you want to see pop up on ZeroNet, now that multiuser sites are implemented?

1@2.body: Sorry, didn't see to post tests here. Wow, this is incredible. Love the immediate HTML injection test :p

1@6.body: Via ZeroBoard - very excited that multiuser sites are now a thing on ZN! Now: Decentralised Reddit, or an imageboard?
